{{QuoteWithCat
|'''[[Ahmet Abdol (Earth-616)|The Monolith]]''' is at the core of it all, as the primal '''Earth''' which is the foundation for all that is to be mine. '''[[Max Eisenhardt (Earth-616)|Magneto]]''' and '''[[Lorna Dane (Earth-616)|Polaris]]''' are '''opposing magnetic poles''', serving to control the flow of the energies at play here... Energies under constant pressure from the forces of nature itself. The '''elemental extremes''' of '''[[Robert Drake (Earth-616)|Iceman]]''', '''[[Ororo Munroe (Earth-616)|Storm]]''' and '''[[Shiro Yoshida (Earth-616)|Sunfire]]'''... stimulated by the unrestrained energies of '''man''' and the '''heavens''', free of any grounding or gravity. '''Father''', '''mother''', and '''son''' -- '''[[Scott Summers (Earth-616)|Cyclops]]''', '''[[Jean Grey (Earth-616)|Phoenix]]''', and '''[[Nathan Summers (Earth-616)|Cable]]''' -- far, far stronger as a whole than a sum of their parts... linked to the powers of '''time''' and '''space''', wielded by '''[[Lucas Bishop (Earth-1191)|Bishop]]''' and '''[[Mikhail Rasputin (Earth-616)|Rasputin]]''', respectively. The power of pure '''thought''' that is '''[[Charles Xavier (Earth-616)|Xavier]]'''. As above so below. As without, so within. And as you '''die''', one by one... '''I''' shall rise as the '''sun''', at the heart of this new universe. All your power will flow into me -- '''through''' me -- through the '''new Ra, ultimately, the be-all and end-all to come!..''' And you, young '''[[Nathaniel Grey (Earth-295)|Nate]]''' -- and the unequaled unlimited '''forces''' at your command-- play the most '''crucial''' role of all in my final design...!|[[En Sabah Nur (Earth-616)|Apocalypse]]|Uncanny X-Men Vol 1 377}}

The Twelve were a group of twelve mutants sought after and collected by Apocalypse in an attempt to combine their power and channel into himself in order to obtain Godhood over the entire cosmos.

| Equipment               = 
| Transportation          = 
| Weapons                 = 

| Notes                   = Others members were thought to be part of this gathering:
* [[Master Mold (Earth-616)|Master Mold]] considered [[Franklin Richards (Earth-616)|Franklin Richards]] potentially as part of the Twelve.{{r|X-Men Vol 2 94}}
* [[Katherine Pryde (Earth-616)|Kitty Pryde]] believed that members of the original five [[Warren Worthington III (Earth-616)|Angel]] and [[Henry McCoy (Earth-616)|Beast]] (especially the former because of his bond to [[En Sabah Nur (Earth-616)|Apocalypse]]) could be part of the Twelve, as well as [[James Howlett (Earth-616)|Wolverine]], seeing his lifespan as a sign of his role to be played. She also initially believed that Alpha-Level Mutants (who included the Twelve [[Jean Grey (Earth-616)|Phoenix]], [[Charles Xavier (Earth-616)|Professor X]] and [[Ororo Munroe (Earth-616)|Storm]]) could be part of them. She started disregarding her own theory after learning that [[Nathaniel Essex (Earth-616)|Sinister]] was part of the list, and eventually thought it to be pointless.{{r|X-Men Vol 2 94}}
